Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #Dampé's Grave#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS Like Like Cage

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say you can cut corners to get to your destination faster.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #time#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Lower

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #the Goron Mask# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

ZF (Jabu).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.
